categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Koryst was a female Sith Lord of the resurgent Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY Koryst resided inside Darth Vengean's Compound when Lord Draahg and another apprentice of Darth Baras stormed the compound, intending to kill Darth Vengean on their master's orders. Koryst engaged the intruders, but was defeated.
